sentences.sContent: The rattlesnake tissues provoked the strongest response of all the species in the study.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rattlesnake tissues provoked the strongest response of all the species in the study.
sentences.sCn: 响尾蛇的组织在本次所有研究物种中所作出的反应最强烈。

sentences.sContent: One family of completely harmless snakes, the kingsnake, has also evolved serum that neutralizes rattlesnake venom and uses that ability to greater advantage than ground squirrels do.
sentences.sContent_eng: One family of completely harmless snakes, the kingsnake, has also evolved serum that neutralizes rattlesnake venom and uses that ability to greater advantage than ground squirrels do.
sentences.sCn: 完全无毒蛇大家庭中的一种，王蛇，也进化出了能中和响尾蛇毒液的血清，并且靠着这一能力获得了比松鼠们更大的好处。

trans.tranOther: a poisonous American snake that shakes its tail to make a noise when it is angry
